Can I at least die with homoerotic diabetes right now? Damn Seto Ryouko. You're a beast. I love romance where you actually get to understand both characters and how they fall for each other. I kinda find the childhood friend or the "Highschool mates that met each other in some bizarre situation" troupes a little overrated. And adults in a fucking yaoI eromanga is damn fresh. I love these two characters so much. Especially the interaction because we get to see two adults slowly falling with each other. Oh and also don't forget about the sex. Because seto ryouko knows how to make one without using ahegaos too much. Which isn't really my taste when it comes to yaoi mangas. Because you know. Morino Bambi. But. Seto Ryouko does know how to make a sex scene hot as fuck. 9/10. Damn I've been reading a lot of great yaois lately. I do hope we get more this month but we'll eventually get the fully english translated version of Morino Bambi's work because I'm still coping
One of the best reads on this website. It’s a slow romance story that feels genuine and it still manages to be extremely hot. Tomgirl stories are the best 10/10

A beautiful story between two shy lovers, such an excellent and relateable read. The gentle touches the top gave towards his bottom were very refreshing in an age were lots of yaoi manga has become all too rapey or full of power trips. Keep your bottoms safe and feeling protected, lads. You'll have much more pleasurable, memorable sex that way 👍 10/10

Very cute and amazing approach towards the relation between the top and bottom. I think this tops the list for me out of most of what I read. This wholesome situation feels realistic and, for lack of better words, alive. The writer draws you in with the dialogue, the small turns and twists.
The sex scene is also good, on the verge of realism (but 2D will never be 3D). Even the feeling of self hatred flaring up in Yumeno, feeling ashamed of himself for feeling happy, the turn of Sera pouring him over with affection feels… blissful, passionate, selfless. 
Like a comment before (Feyris) stated “(it) shows how much the author knows about the way healthy sex works in real life.”, this is the feeling I echo, through and through. 
This doujin does amazing with character and story but doesn’t leave us feeling empty with a bad sex scene, rather both compliment into it. 
Hats off to the artist, I recommend supporting him (her/it, I don’t judge) for more amazing pieces like this.
WHYYY IS HEE SO CUTEEEEEEEE I CAN'T ENDURE ITT AND WHY IT IS SO WHOLESOME. This was just too good for me what a good artist my idol.
SOOOO FUCKING CUTEEE

I think this is legitimately the best yaoi I've ever read. Both characters are mature and relatable adults with very realistic personalities, and yet the events of the doujin feel special because of the exceptional circumstances. The "top" constantly makes sure that the bottom is okay at every step of their intercourse and keep reconfirming the consent, which shows how much the author knows about the way healthy sex works in real life. The most impressive part is how the sex scene itself still manages to be incredibly sexy and arousing despite this realism, thanks to the great quality of the art and the cute dialogues and interactions. This doujin is an absolute masterclass about how to make a very high quality gay porn story that manages to be realistic, relatable, and incredibly sexy all at the same time. Obviously, everyone is free to judge it based on their personal criterias, but to me this is a 1000 out of 10
